title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. The description provided is not sufficient to understand the issue.
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be displayed when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open a binary project. 2. Select a file within the project. 3. Press F4 key.
